text: Kush is a nation of southwestern Aerona , on the plane of Dominaria . It lies south of the Tonga Mountains . north of Barbar and west of the Green Lands . Kush is primarily known for the Festival of Estark . Leshrac Nightwalker dominated part of it before being imprisoned in Phyrexia . Estark , the festival city and high barony Farndrel The Seven Dragons Inn. Tantium a port city Gish , a back-country barony near the Green Lands with vineyards
